title: Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program Using Real-World Mathematics-Based Worksheets

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Real-life contextual math problems approached through flipped learning and problem-based learning, with smartphone-based online flipbooks as supplementary materials

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze math problems reflecting real-world contexts and derive solutions.
Learners can apply collaborative problem-solving strategies through problem-based learning (PBL) activities.
Learners can enhance self-directed learning abilities using online flipbooks and master 80% or more of the content.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
